imdb.plot outline: Taibah marries Saleh, living happily and having three kids: Maha, Fahd, and Sharifah. She seeks to raise her kids in the best way, but problems occurring between her and her husband prevent that. The kids grow confused. She seeks her brother's help.
imdb.title: Hajr al-Habib
plot: Taibah marries Saleh, living happily and having three kids: Maha, Fahd, and Sharifah. She seeks to raise her kids in the best way, but problems occurring between her and her husband prevent that. The kids grow confused. She seeks her brother's help.::Anonymous
